long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a thing on Miniflux! Our Chrome extension quickly checks for unread entries, keeping you in the loop without any hassle. Just enter your self-hosted url and API token, and you'll be able to easily see if there are any articles you've missed with just a look at the icon.
